newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunker holds steady in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunker holds steady in quiet trade.

text.p: Singapore bunker quotes held steady on Monday with traders expecting a quiet trading session later in the day.

Bunker 180-cst was quoted at $103-$105 and 380-cst at $96/$98. "But if you have regular customers, they are willing to pay some $7-$8 (per tonne) above cargo prices," said a trader with an independent supplier, seeing higher quotes.
The 180-cst grade fuel oil was bid at $98.50 on Friday.
MDO and gas oil were quoted at around $195 and $215 respectively.
